solution_line_template: Savannah has {total_gifts} gifts to give her friends and family and has already wrapped {gifts_first_roll} gifts + {gifts_second_roll} gifts = {gifts_wrapped_first_two} gifts already wrapped with the first two rolls of paper.

She started off with {total_gifts} gifts to wrap and has already wrapped {gifts_wrapped_first_two}, {total_gifts} - {gifts_wrapped_first_two} = <<{total_gifts}-{gifts_wrapped_first_two}={gifts_third_roll}>>{gifts_third_roll} gifts she wraps with the third roll of paper.
